current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To improve health care furnished by the Department of
		  Veterans Affairs by increasing access to complementary and alternative medicine
		  and other approaches to wellness and preventive care, and for other
		  purposes.
